name: Trickle-Down Economics
description:
WASD to move the crane
Arrow keys to rotate and raise/lower the crane
Spacebar to close/open the crane

Having an infinite source of income it becomes your responsibility to get the money flowing down all over. Hum the anthem absentmindedly,
set your money up for cascading action in the shape of itself...
and throw it down to make it rain to the poor!

This game was made in a really short time during Global Game Jam 2018 by:

  • Game idea: Jesús J. Fernández
  • Art stuff: Alberto Rico
  • Code: JF Campos
  • Sounds: Totally not made by Daniel Parejo in two minutes.
  • Music: recorded by the amazing KrillAudio, and sung by Francis Moyano
